name: Rave Restaurant Group, Inc.
description: Rave Restaurant Group, Inc. is a leading company in the fast-casual dining sector, primarily known for its innovative pizza concept, Pie Five Pizza Co. Founded in 2011 and headquartered in Dallas, Texas, RAVE focuses on providing high-quality, customizable pizzas made with fresh ingredients and a wide variety of toppings. The company's business model emphasizes speed and convenience, with a focus on serving made-to-order pizzas that cater to the evolving tastes of consumers. RAVE operates through both company-owned and franchised locations, enabling it to expand its footprint across various markets. In addition to Pie Five, RAVE also owns and operates the iconic Pizza Inn brand, which has a legacy of serving delicious pizzas since 1958. RAVE is committed to enhancing the customer experience by leveraging technology, including online ordering and delivery services, to meet the demands of modern diners. The company’s mission is to create memorable dining experiences while maintaining a strong emphasis on quality and customer satisfaction. With a robust growth strategy, RAVE aims to expand its brand presence and continue innovating in the fast-casual dining space.

key_executives.name: Darin L. W. G. A. Anderson

faq.question: What is Rave Restaurant Group known for?
faq.answer: Rave Restaurant Group is known for its fast-casual dining concepts, particularly Pie Five Pizza Co. and Pizza Inn.

faq.question: Where is Rave Restaurant Group headquartered?
faq.answer: Rave Restaurant Group is headquartered in Dallas, Texas, USA.

faq.question: When was Rave Restaurant Group founded?
faq.answer: Rave Restaurant Group was founded in 2011.

faq.question: What types of products does Rave Restaurant Group offer?
faq.answer: Rave offers a variety of products, including custom pizzas, signature pizzas, salads, and desserts.
